title: The Circle recap: Sammie ups their gameplan as 'Josh' is blocked
text:
Ella burst into giggles as she met the real Josh (Picture: Channel 4)

Busayo has become the latest player blocked from The Circle – as the ‘Revolution’ of the show’s underdogs began to take effect.

The Londoner said goodbye to her time as catfish Josh after getting an instant block from the game, but before leaving for good popped by Ella’s flat to reveal herself.

Ella burst into fits of laughter as Busayo burst through the door and not the middle class white boy she was expecting to see.

She eventually asked: ‘Oh my God. Who the f*** are you?! You’re amazing!’

Busayo then revealed that she came on the show as a white man to see if it would affect her ability to be popular.

‘I’m honestly so glad that it didn’t work,’ she said. ‘Because it’s a testament to people in here.’

‘It breaks my heart that you did it, but I get where you’re coming from,’ Ella told her, before adding: ‘I think you would go further than Josh. Dead cert.’

The girls immediately hit it off (Picture: Channel 4)

While Busayo gave Ella her backing, things were a-brewing away from the reigning champion of the game – with Sammie (aka James) concocting a plan to scheme his way to the top of the leaderboard and become an influencer to out his competitors.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Launching into a scheme with Paddy and Georgina, ‘Sammie’ made no issue with revealing plans to take out the high-rising players – with Ella, Tim and Woody on their radar.

It worked like a charm too, as Sammie was crowned champion in the next ratings, giving her influencer status.

James is scheming to get his way to the £100k prize (Picture: Channel 4)

She’s now got to work her magic on Tim, who maintained his influencer crown, in order to take out Ella in the next elimination.

Can Tim put his foot down or will he be talked into eliminating one of his closest friends in the game?

The Circle continues weeknights 10pm on Channel 4.

description: As The Circle comes to an end, game-playing has seriously begun - and Busayo was the first victim of Sammie and her 'circle of trust'.
